ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Provides JSON parsing capability through the 'Rapidjson' 'C++' header-only library.
Provides JSON parsing capability through the 'Rapidjson' 'C++' header-only library.

name: r-rapidjsonr
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.2.1" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-rapidjsonr
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/rapidjsonr_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/rapidjsonr/rapidjsonr_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: bd447155af45c812e97d2e9f25faebd4aed0acc4a11c8d002bc50549c50a448c

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('rapidjsonr')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('rapidjsonr')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=rapidjsonr
  license: MIT
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT
    - LICENSE
  summary: "Provides JSON parsing capability through the 'Rapidjson' 'C++' header-only library. "
  license_family: MIT

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: rapidjsonr
# Type: Package
# Title: 'Rapidjson' C++ Header Files
# Version: 1.1
# Date: 2018-09-22
# Authors@R: c( person("David", "Cooley", ,"dcooley@symbolix.com.au", role = c("aut", "cre")), person("Milo", "Yip", , role = "ctb", comment = "Author of c++ rapidjson library, provided through THL A29 Limited, a Tencent company"), person("Alexander", "Chemeris", role = "ctb", comment = "Author of c++ msinttypes library") )
# Description: Provides JSON parsing capability through the 'Rapidjson' 'C++' header-only library.
# License: MIT + file LICENSE
# Encoding: UTF-8
# LazyData: true
# RoxygenNote: 6.0.1
# SystemRequirements: GNU make
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2018-09-22 06:52:55 UTC; dave
